Jim Lawton

Jim Lawton was born in London in 1991. He is rhythm guitarist and one of the singers in the band Crystal Seagulls, a four piece rock band. Crystal Seagulls have performed all over the country, notably headlining venues such as Barfly, The Water Rats, Proud, The Troubadour, The Notting Hill Arts Club, Hard Rock Cafe and their stage at 2012's sell out Brisfest. Last Year they played The Big Top stage at the Isle of Wight Festival. Currently Jim is on tour with his band Crystal Seagulls playing festivals and concerts up and down the country with names such as Kings of Leon, Rival Sons, and Red Hot Chilli Peppers. Jim is also a songwriter and composer; he wrote the soundtrack for Blue Horizon's first film A Journey with Nomads. He has been enlisted to compose a soundtrack for Blue Horizons' upcoming 2TouchRulz documentary. Visit: www.crystalseagulls.com
